channel.title: CVE Feed for CoolKit -- eWeLink Cloud Service
channel.description: The latest CVEs for CoolKit -- eWeLink Cloud Service

item.title: CVE-2024-7205|2024-07-31T14:56:35.429Z -- coolkit -- ewelink%20cloud%20service
item.description: When the device is shared, the homepage module are before 2.19.0 in eWeLink Cloud Service allows Secondary user to take over devices as primary user via sharing unnecessary device-sensitive information.
